building.description: The Lander Hab is a general purpose habitat for four persons. It serves as a jack-of-all-trades building that houses many basic but critical functions to jump start a settlement.

The Inflatable Greenhouse is essentially a flexible airâ€…bladder made with interwoven layers of Polyurethane, Kevlar, polyester, Saran and Tedlar materials to retain an atmosphere adequate for growing a limited number of crops as the food source for the settlers. It is UV-resistant, bullet-resistant and has an aluminized Mylar reflector curtain. It also houses one workbench with instruments for botany research.
The MD1 Nuclear Reactor is the first generation, small and self-contained 80kW nuclear reactor that is built for Martian environment and requires minimal maintenance.
The starting ERV base was sent ahead of the arrival of the human crew and stores full tanks of hydrogen for settlement's use.

The Earth Return Vehicle (ERV) is a spacecraft structure with built-in Sabatier chemical reactor. The ERV base has already converted its initial load of hydrogen into carbon dioxide, water and oxygen.
The MD4 Nuclear Reactor is a medium-sized, self-contained 200kW Martian-reated nuclear reactor that requires minimal maintenance.
The Atmospheric Processor is an uninhabitable specialized building providing automatic water and air processing and recycling for the settlement
The Residential Quarters is the first specialized living accommodation building that is configurable with enough space to house as many as 12 beds.

The Lounge is a rest and relaxation living space furnished with dining tables and chairs for serving almost three dozens of people at a time. It has a well furnished kitchen supporting a lot of food processing activities and plenty of resource storage space. It also has a small gym room with exercise equipment.
The Infirmary is the first medical facility equipped to provide more adequate medical care for settlers. It houses one workbench with equipment for medical research.
The Command and Control is a communication facility with networking capability for high speed communications, central EVA operations and colony-width connectivity.

The Large Greenhouse is made of stronger structural and cladding material such as coextruded laminate of polyamide and polyolefin interwoven around an aluminum frame to give rise to a scaffolded retention bladder. It is furnished with a botany research lab with instruments. It has a spacious interior for high volume crop cultivation and has a high resource storage capability.

The Laboratory is a modest facility furnished with workbench, instruments, computers and tablets and peer collaboration communication suites of equipment that enables making scientific inquiries on the froniter of Mars.
The Garage is an enclosed maintenance facility for building, repairing and modifying Martian rovers and vehicles
The Workshop is practically a machine shop furnished with 3-D printers and additive manufacturing machinaries for processing resources, snythesizing parts and items for use.

The Methane Power generator utilized methane gas for the generation of electricity. It makes use of the freely available carbon dioxide in the Martian atmosphere and creates non-polluting by-products.

The Wind Turbine power generator provides a completely non-polluting form of renewable energy. Asides from typical maintenance tasks, it is an integral part of a modular distributed renewable energy generation system complimenting the nuclear power generators for the power grid.

The Solar Photovoltaic Array is an array of steerable photovoltaic panels that generates electricity from Martian sunlight. It is an essential part of a modular distributed renewable energy generation system for the power grid.
The Solar Thermal Array is an array of steerable parabolic reflectors that concentrates sunlight for heating up molten materials that move mechanical turbines generating power.
The Small Areothermal Well is an geothermal energy production system that captures the trapped underground heat for the power grid.
The Large Areothermal Well is an geothermal energy production system that features more advance geothermal flow path for ground loop design for capturing heat and creating electricity.
The Concrete Storage Bin is a small brick bin for storing dry concrete material for light contruction project.
The Cement Storage Bin is a small brick bin for storing dry cement for light contruction project.
The Mortar Storage Bin is a small brick bin for storing dry mortar for light contruction project.
The Lime Storage Bin is a small brick bin for storing lime for light contruction project.
The Carbon Storage Bin is a small brick bin for storing carbon for light contruction project.
The Regolith Storage Bin is a small brick bin for storing Martian regolith for light contruction project.
The Sand Storage Bin is a small brick bin for storing Martian sand for light contruction project.
The Ice Storage Bin is a small brick bin for handling and storing extracted ice for future use.
The Manufacturing Shed is a small brick manufacturing building for forming, cutting, coating and glazing bricks for construction projects.
The Bunkhouse is a spartan living quarters with two beds. It is a retractable housing custom-tailored for temporary mining outpost operation.

The Small Sabatier Processor is a small building housing a sabatier system that features the chemical reaction between hydrogen and carbonâ€…dioxide at elevated temperatures and pressures in the presence of a nickel catalyst to produce methane and water.
The Small Battery Array showcased an advanced battery system that stored excess power during non-peak hours and released power during peak power usage.

The Astronomy Observatory is a small self-contained observatory building furnished with an optical telescope, research workbenches and laboratory equipment as well as a built-in EVA airlock for ingress and egress.
The Storage Hab is a Lander Hab refitted storage building with ample storage space. It has built-in PV panels as backup power source.
The Research Hab is a Lander Hab refitted laboratory building for scientific research. It can be custom-tailored with computer systems for up to four research subjects and has built-in solar panels.
The Residential Hab is a Lander Hab refitted residential quarters for living accommodation of up to 8 persons. It uses solar panels as backup power source.
The Medical Hab is a Lander Hab refitted medical facility for providing medical basic care. It also has medical research workbench and uses solar panels as backup power source.
The Machinery Hab is a Lander Hab refitted manufacturing workshop for making items and synthesizing resource. It provides storage space for housing commonly used resources.
The Outpost Hub is a vaulted brick building that acts as the main hub of a trading or mining outpost. Like its cousin Lander Hab, it hosts a suite of functions to its inhabitants.
The Storage Shed is a small brick building for storing resources for the settlement.
The Loading Dock Garage is an enclosed maintenance facility featuring a brick loading dock for easy access. It has equipment for building, repairing and modifying rovers and vehicles.
The Mining Lab is a small brick laboratory furnished for mining-related scientific instruments and research workbench.
The Inground Greenhouse is a semi underground structure with a vaulted flber glass roof which is less suceptible to meteor damage. It grows crops as food for the settlement.
The Hallway is a pressurized access tube connecting two inhabitable buildings. It allows only one person to access it at a time.
The Tunnel is an underground pressurized access tube connecting two inhabitable buildings. It allows only one person to access it at a time.
